# split the text into words and lowercase
    words = [word.lower() for word in re.findall(r'\w+', text)]
    # remove common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]
    # count occurrences of words
    counts = Counter(words)
    return counts

# Split the text into words
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text.lower())

    # Remove common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Calculate the frequency of each word
    frequency = Counter(words)

    return frequency

# Remove punctuation, stopwords, and newlines
    text = text.lower()
    text = re.sub('[^\w\s]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', text)

    # Split text into words
    words = text.split()

    # Remove common stopwords
    words = [w for w in words if w not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the occurrences of each word
    word_count = Counter(words)

    # Remove words with a frequency lower than 0.05
    filtered_word_count = {word: count for word, count in word_count.items() if count > 0.05}

    return filtered_word_count

# Split the text into words and remove punctuation marks and common stopwords
    words = nltk.wordpunct_tokenize(text)
    words = [w.lower() for w in words if w not in STOPWORDS and w.isalnum()]
    # Calculate the frequency of each word
    return Counter(words)

text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text)
    words = [word.lower() for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

# Remove punctuation and common stopwords
    text = re.sub('[^\w]', ' ', text)
    text = text.lower()
    text = ''.join([word for word in text.split() if word not in STOPWORDS])
    # Count words
    words = Counter(text.split())
    return words

# Split the input text into words and remove punctuation and stopwords
    words = [word for word in re.findall(r'\w+', text.lower())
                 if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the frequency of words
    word_freq = Counter(words)

    # Filter out words with frequency less than 3
    word_freq = {word: freq for word, freq in word_freq.items() if freq > 3}

    return word_freq

# Split the text into words
    words = [word for word in re.split('[^a-z0-9]', text.lower()) if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Calculate the frequency of each word
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

text = re.sub('[' + string.punctuation + ']+', '', text)

    # Remove stopwords, digits, and punctuation marks
    text = re.sub(r'\b\w{2,}\b', '', text)
    # Convert to lowercase
    text = text.lower()

    # Convert to list and count occurrences
    count_words = Counter(text.split())

    # Filter out the common stopwords
    for stopword in STOPWORDS:
        if stopword in count_words:
            del count_words[stopword]

    return count_words

# Split the input text into words and lowercase them
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text.lower())
    # Remove punctuation and common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word.lower() not in STOPWORDS]
    # Count the occurrences of each word and return as a dictionary
    return Counter(words)

words = re.findall(r'\w+', text)
    words_lower = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words_no_punc = [re.sub(r'[^\w]', '', word) for word in words_lower]
    words_no_stop = [word for word in words_no_punc if word not in STOPWORDS]

    freq_dict = Counter(words_no_stop)

    return freq_dict

# Split the text into words, remove punctuation, convert to lowercase, remove stopwords
    words = re.sub(r'[^a-z]', ' ', text.lower()).split()
    words = [w for w in words if w not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the frequency of words
    freq = Counter(words)

    return freq

# Split the text into words and remove punctuation marks and stopwords
    words = [word.lower() for word in text.split() if word not in STOPWORDS and not re.match(r"^[\w]+$", word)]

    # Calculate the frequency of each word
    return Counter(words)

# Create regular expressions for punctuation and stopwords
    punc_regex = re.compile('[%s]' % re.escape(string.punctuation))
    stopwords = [s.lower() for s in STOPWORDS]
    regex = re.compile(r'\b(%s)\b' % '|'.join(stopwords))

    # Remove punctuation and stopwords
    words = [regex.sub('', punc_regex.sub('', word)).lower() for word in text.split()]

    # Count occurrences of each word
    word_counts = Counter(words)

    return word_counts

# Remove common stopwords and punctuation
    words = [word.lower() for word in re.findall(r'\w+', text) if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Calculate word frequencies
    word_freq = Counter(words)

    return word_freq

# Split the text into words
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text.lower())

    # Remove common stopwords and punctuation
    filtered_words = [w for w in words if w not in STOPWORDS and re.search(r'\w', w)]

    # Calculate the frequency of words
    return Counter(filtered_words)

# Split the text into words
    words = nltk.word_tokenize(text)

    # Convert words to lowercase
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]

    # Remove punctuation marks and common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]
    words = [re.sub('[^\w]', '', word) for word in words]

    # Calculate the frequency of each word
    freq = Counter(words)
    return freq

word_counts = Counter()

    # Convert the text to lowercase, remove punctuation, and remove common stopwords
    words = [word.lower() for word in re.findall(r"\w+", text) if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the occurrences of each word
    for word in words:
        word_counts[word] += 1

    return dict(word_counts)

# Convert the input text to a list of words
    words = re.split(r'\W+', text)
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]

    # Remove common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the occurrences of each word
    counter = Counter(words)

    # Convert the dictionary to a list of tuples
    word_counts = [(word, counter[word]) for word in counter]

    # Sort the list based on the word frequency
    word_counts.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)

    # Return a dictionary of word counts
    return dict(word_counts)

# Split the text into words
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text)

    # Convert words to lowercase
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]

    # Remove punctuation and common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the frequency of each word
    word_counts = Counter(words)

    return word_counts

words = re.sub(r'[^\w]', ' ', text).split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]
    words_count = Counter(words)

    return words_count

words = re.findall(r'\w+', text)  # split the input text into words
    words = [word.lower() for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]  # remove stopwords

    word_freqs = Counter(words)  # count the frequency of each word

    return word_freqs

# split text into words
    words = re.findall(r'\w+', text)

    # convert words to lowercase
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]

    # remove punctuation marks and common stopwords
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # count the frequency of words
    word_freq = Counter(words)

    # return the word frequency dictionary
    return word_freq

text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s]', '', text)
    words = text.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in STOPWORDS]
    return Counter(words).most_common()

word_list = re.findall(r'\w+', text)
    word_count = Counter()

    for word in word_list:
        word = word.lower()
        word = re.sub(r'[^\w\s]', '', word)
        if word not in STOPWORDS:
            word_count[word] += 1

    return word_count

# Split the text into words using regular expressions and remove punctuation and stopwords
    words = [word for word in re.findall(r'\w+', text.lower())
             if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Calculate the frequency of each word using the Counter object
    return Counter(words)

words = [word for word in re.split(r'\W+', text) if word not in STOPWORDS]

    word_count = Counter(words)

    return word_count

# Remove punctuation and stopwords
    words = [word.lower() for word in re.findall(r'\w+', text) if word not in STOPWORDS]

    # Count the occurrences of each word
    return Counter(words)
